entry.string: Adds a new course to system.
entry.translation: Edds a noo cuoorse-a tu system.

entry.string: View all courses that have been added.
entry.translation: Feeoo ell cuoorses thet hefe-a beee edded. Bork bork bork!

entry.string: Modify the configuration for the module
entry.translation: Mudeeffy zee cunffeegooreshun fur zee mudoole
